docs.snippet: Stock investors have endured a number of big drops over past three decades. Monday’s sell-off, on a percentage basis, isn’t close to the worst.

headline.main: DealBook Briefing: How Monday’s Stock Plunge Ranks?

docs.snippet: Berkshire Hathaway, JPMorgan Chase and Amazon are teaming up to form an independent health care company to serve their employees.

headline.main: 4 Questions as Amazon, Berkshire and JPMorgan Take on Health Care: DealBook Briefing

docs.snippet: JPMorgan Chase named Daniel Pinto and Gordon Smith as co-presidents and co-chief operating officers.

headline.main: JPMorgan Promotes Pinto and Smith to Co-Presidents: DealBook Briefing

docs.snippet: Ancient fortresses, crisp mountain streams, curious people and healing cities: Travelers are discovering the Kurdish region of Iraq, a place of great beauty, haunted by war.
It has happened yet again: Inevitably, predictably, fatefully, a gunman shot dead 26 people in a Texas church on Sunday.

docs.snippet: The owner of The Los Angeles Times is close to a deal to sell the newspaper to Patrick Soon-Shiong, a billionaire Los Angeles doctor.

headline.main: DealBook Briefing: Tronc Nears Deal to Sell Los Angeles Times

docs.snippet: The British firm Bell Pottinger, hired by three brothers now caught up in a nationwide corruption scandal, helped drive racial tensions to levels not felt since apartheid.

headline.print_headline: Rogues, Despots and the Collapse of a P.R. Firm
headline.main: How Bell Pottinger, P.R. Firm for Despots and Rogues, Met Its End in South Africa

docs.snippet: Former residents of Chicago’s Cabrini-Green were thrown into a system that increasingly leaves the poor to fend for themselves.

headline.main: The Towers Came Down, and With Them the Promise of Public Housing

docs.snippet: The agency was seemingly slowed by jurisdictional issues, and athletes went unwarned that a potential child molester was in their midst.

headline.print_headline: Molested as F.B.I. Case Plodded for a Year
headline.main: As F.B.I. Took a Year to Pursue the Nassar Case, Dozens Say They Were Molested
